info.title: Name Resolver
info.description:
Name Resolution/Name Lookup service

This service takes lexical strings and attempts to map them to identifiers (CURIEs) from a vocabulary or ontology. The lookup is not exact, but includes partial matches.

Multiple results may be returned representing possible conceptual matches, but all of the identifiers have been correctly normalized using the Node Normalization service.

get.summary: Get status and counts for this NameRes instance.
get.description: This endpoint will return status information and a list of counts from the underlying Solr instance for this NameRes instance.

get.summary: Look up synonyms for a CURIE.
get.description: Returns a list of synonyms for a particular preferred CURIE. You can normalize a CURIE to a preferred CURIE using NodeNorm.

parameters.name: preferred_curies

schema.description: A list of CURIEs to look up synonyms for.
schema.title: Preferred Curies

parameters.description: A list of CURIEs to look up synonyms for.

schema.title: Response Lookup Names Get Synonyms Get

post.summary: Look up synonyms for a CURIE.
post.description: Returns a list of synonyms for a particular preferred CURIE. You can normalize a CURIE to a preferred CURIE using NodeNorm.

schema.title: Response Lookup Names Post Synonyms Post

get.summary: Look up cliques for a fragment of a name or synonym.
get.description: Returns cliques with a name or synonym that contains a specified string.

parameters.name: autocomplete

schema.description: Is the input string incomplete (autocomplete=true) or a complete phrase (autocomplete=false)?
schema.title: Autocomplete

parameters.description: Is the input string incomplete (autocomplete=true) or a complete phrase (autocomplete=false)?

parameters.name: highlighting

schema.description: Return information on which labels and synonyms matched the search query?
schema.title: Highlighting

parameters.description: Return information on which labels and synonyms matched the search query?

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: The number of results to skip. Can be used to page through the results of a query.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Can be used to page through the results of a query.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: The number of results to skip. Can be used to page through the results of a query.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Can be used to page through the results of a query.

parameters.name: biolink_type

schema.description: The Biolink types to filter to (with or without the `biolink:` prefix), e.g. `biolink:Disease` or `Disease`. Multiple types will be combined with OR, i.e. filtering for PhenotypicFeature and Disease will return concepts that are either PhenotypicFeatures OR Disease, not concepts that are both PhenotypicFeature AND Disease.
schema.title: Biolink Type

parameters.description: The Biolink types to filter to (with or without the `biolink:` prefix), e.g. `biolink:Disease` or `Disease`. Multiple types will be combined with OR, i.e. filtering for PhenotypicFeature and Disease will return concepts that are either PhenotypicFeatures OR Disease, not concepts that are both PhenotypicFeature AND Disease.

parameters.name: only_prefixes

schema.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of prefixes to filter to, e.g. `MONDO|EFO`.
schema.title: Only Prefixes

parameters.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of prefixes to filter to, e.g. `MONDO|EFO`.

parameters.name: exclude_prefixes

schema.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of prefixes to exclude, e.g. `UMLS|EFO`.
schema.title: Exclude Prefixes

parameters.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of prefixes to exclude, e.g. `UMLS|EFO`.

parameters.name: only_taxa

schema.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of taxa to filter, e.g. `NCBITaxon:9606|NCBITaxon:10090|NCBITaxon:10116|NCBITaxon:7955`.
schema.title: Only Taxa

parameters.description: Pipe-separated, case-sensitive list of taxa to filter, e.g. `NCBITaxon:9606|NCBITaxon:10090|NCBITaxon:10116|NCBITaxon:7955`.

schema.title: Response Lookup Curies Get Lookup Get

strings.title: Strings
strings.description: The strings to search for. The returned results will be in a dictionary with these values as keys.

autocomplete.description: Is the input string incomplete (autocomplete=true) or a complete phrase (autocomplete=false)?

biolink_types.description: The Biolink types to filter to (with or without the `biolink:` prefix), e.g. `biolink:Disease` or `Disease`. Multiple types will be combined with OR, i.e. filtering for PhenotypicFeature and Disease will return concepts that are either PhenotypicFeatures OR Disease, not concepts that are both PhenotypicFeature AND Disease.
